analysis.description:
DIPToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/28/0x839e2ff740ec0d96ac613724141ae5bfa5fea136.sol#103-104) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0x839e2ff740ec0d96ac613724141ae5bfa5fea136.sol#219-270)
tokens in DIPToken.fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0x839e2ff740ec0d96ac613724141ae5bfa5fea136.sol#223-224) is a local variable never initialiazed

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/28/0x839e2ff740ec0d96ac613724141ae5bfa5fea136.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/28/0x839e2ff740ec0d96ac613724141ae5bfa5fea136.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/28/0x839e2ff740ec0d96ac613724141ae5bfa5fea136.sol#82) is not in mixedCase
